${ModID}:AirCurrent.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If the target has ${ModID}:Petra, 给予 !M! 层 易伤。
${ModID}:AirCurrent.NAME: Air Current

${ModID}:DustTornado.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 一张牌 in hand to play !M! random cards from your 弃牌堆. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:DustTornado.NAME: Dust Tornado

${ModID}:Enervate.DESCRIPTION: Enemy 失去s half of its 力量, then 失去s !M! more. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Enervate.NAME: Enervate

${ModID}:Excavation.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Fetch !M! cards from your 弃牌堆 and Retain them。
${ModID}:Excavation.NAME: Excavation

${ModID}:Geomorphology.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you 消耗 一张牌 or Channel an Orb, apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra to a random enemy。
${ModID}:Geomorphology.NAME: Geomorphology

${ModID}:GeothermalHeating.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! additional 格挡 for each distinct debuff on the target。
${ModID}:GeothermalHeating.NAME: Geothermal Heating

${ModID}:Lithosphere.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra。
${ModID}:Lithosphere.NAME: Lithosphere

${ModID}:MudFissure.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals double damage if the target has debuffs。
${ModID}:MudFissure.NAME: Mud Fissure

${ModID}:RagingInferno.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:RagingInferno.NAME: Raging Inferno
${ModID}:RagingInferno.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite。

${ModID}:TectonicQuake.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 and apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra and Weak to ALL enemies. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:TectonicQuake.NAME: Tectonic Quake
${ModID}:TectonicQuake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 and apply !M! ${ModID}:Petra and Weak to ALL enemies。
